attributes.action: Get Dave OG Miles off benefits!
attributes.additional_details: I am making this petition to finally get that ungrateful man of our well earned tax payer money. How can someone be allowed to sit on facebook all day mocking people for going to work? He clams he has a disability, I see no real reason why this man can't get a job. he can quite easily operate a computer so why can't he quite easily stack shelves? All I want our government to do is look into why this man can't work? and if he can why are we paying him to do nothing?
